MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry, affecting properties in Blodwell Park, Chapel Terrace, Blodwell Bank and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing network investigations and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:48pm on 26th December 2020.
